Akane scrambled away from me and hurriedly fixed\nher clothes.%K%P
'Maybe now you'll quit with all the teasing.'%K%P
'But it's so much fun to tease you...'%K%P
Her clothes restored, Akane pursed her lips at\nme.%K%P
'Sure, sure. I look forward to it.'%K%P
I patted her shoulder and smiled wryly.%K%P
But thanks to her little prank, all my dark\nthoughts from before were gone.%K%P
